description:
* Based on a fantasy romance light novel series written by http://anidb.net/cr83129 [Ishida Rinne] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr50817 [Izumi].
Matsurika is a court lady serving at the emperor`s inner palace, who is known for her good memory. One day, she receives a request to serve as a practice partner for the marriage meeting for the son a certain noble house. But when she arrives to meet this noble scion, it turns out to be none other than Emperor Hakuyou himself. The emperor falls in love with her at first sight, but tells her to come to him once she passes the state`s scholar-official civil service exam.
Source: ANN

titles.title: The Tale of the Scholar-Official Matsurika
